alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Nemaha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 8:26PM CDT until April 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JOHNSON AND WEST CENTRAL NEMAHA COUNTIES... At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Johnson, or 7 miles northeast of Tecumseh, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. This storm has a history of producing half dollar sized hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tecumseh, Johnson and Brock. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
